name: Don't Die Now
description:
Don't Die Now is a Platformer Game set in the ocean made for Mini Jam #84.  It is a rage quit platformer where you are your own ammo.  You have 2 bullets, so try your best to not use them much because once you have 0 bullets, you die.  Oh, also, there are enemies!  Be clever in trying to use your environment to destroy your enemies!

Controls:

A, Left Arrow Key = Move Left

D, Right Arrow Key = Move Right

Spacebar, Enter/Return, Up Arrow Key = Jump

Mouse = Selecting/Clicking

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Have fun!

- Made by thisGameDev

Assets/Resources that aren't mine that I used in the game:

Ocean Background by KnoblePersona:  https://opengameart.org/content/ocean-background

Explosive Barrel by Denton Boy: https://opengameart.org/content/explosive-barrel
